sourcesContent:
Resultado coincidente

Productos populares.

 import { Component, Input, OnInit, SimpleChanges } from '@angular/core'; import { ProductEntity } from 'src/app/interface/productEntity'; import { SearchModel } from 'src/app/interface/searchModel'; import { productServicio } from 'src/app/servicios/product.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-products', templateUrl: './products.component.html', styleUrls: ['./products.component.css'] }) export class ProductsComponent implements OnInit{ products: ProductEntity[] = []; @Input() SearchResults : SearchModel = { products: [], active: false }; constructor( private _productService: productServicio ){} ngOnInit(): void { this.loadMostSelling(); } // ngOnChanges(changes: SearchModel) { // if(changes.active){ // console.log("En hijo"); // this.products = changes.products; // console.log(this.products); // this.searchRunning = changes.active; // console.log(this.searchRunning); // } // } loadMostSelling(){ this._productService.mostSellingList() .subscribe((seleccion: ProductEntity[]) => { this.products = seleccion; }) .add() } }
